title: Southampton must build on Arsenal display for ´vital´ games ahead, says Martin
description: Russell Martin wants to see his Southampton side replicate their performances against the Premier League’s biggest clubs when they face opponents closer to them in the table. Following their return from the international break, the Saints face Everton and Wolves, but start by welcoming Leicester City to St. Mary’s this Saturday. title: Man Utd´s Zirkzee reveals NBA inspiration
description: Joshua Zirkzee has been hugely influenced by NBA great Allen Iverson, the Manchester United forward said ahead of Saturday’s clash with Brentford. United return to Premier League action against the Bees at Old Trafford in desperate need of a victory. They have lost their last two home league matches, and Erik ten Hag is under […] The post Man Utd´s Zirkzee reveals NBA inspiration appeared first on Soccer News.
